Text:
For those who are having trouble with the crack remember this. The crack only works if you install both the base game and the expansion.

If you only want to play the base game, you'll have to install patch v1.1 (which is on the expansion disc) and then apply the crack I gave you.
Does this come with the DLC?
I'm getting some weird error when i click install. 1608:Unable to create InstallDriver Instance. Any suggestions?

For those that are wondering.

SWAT 4 Gold Edition contains the original SWAT 4 and the expansion "The Stetchkov Syndicate".
